dialogues.text: Great job, dear! You learn fast!
Thank you Professor. But really, I wouldn't have done it without your teachings.
Oh we aren't done yet dear! There's still one more batch to do before the end of the demo!
Aw seriously? That was a lot of work already...
Such is the work of Anabolism Melanie dear. These molecules are vital for survival! Better to have too many than too little.
